function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Installation of proper ventilation systems and air filters","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purification systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Architects, building owners, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of airborne infection control policies in hospital architecture design","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission within healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Implementation of airborne infection control policies, proper ventilation in hospital architecture design","Technologies":"Infection control protocols, HVAC systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospital administrators, architects, healthcare facility owners"},{"Description":"Presence of potentially dangerous contaminants in indoor spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, implementation of air purification systems","Technologies":"Disinfectants, air purification systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
